original_text: And there before me was the glory of the God of Israel, as in the vision I had seen in the plain.
korean_text: 이스라엘 하나님의 영광이 거기에 있는데 내가 들에서 본 모습과 같더라

sentences.original_text: And there before me was the glory of the God of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내 앞에 이스라엘의 하나님의 영광이 있었고

sentences.original_text: as in the vision I had seen
